resources.string: Test your knowledge of music made in the 1980s
What other two bands did the members of Love and Rockets play with?
True or False: Biz Markie\'s nickname was the \"Clown Prince of Hip Hop\"?
Which songs were hits for The GoGos?
What are the last four words of this lyric from Billy Ocean\'s \"Caribbean Queen\"?
\"Caribbean Queen, now we\'re sharing the same dream, and our hearts they beat as one, no more ____ __ ___ ___\"
Who lives in Tennessee because all his exes live in Texas?
Who were the members of the supergroup LSG?
\"Come On Eileen\" was a huge hit for Men At Work.
What are the first four words to Suzanne Vega\'s biggest hit song?
\"__ ____ __ ____ , I live on the second floor, I live upstairs from you, yes I think you\'ve seen me before\"
Daniel Ash, Kevin Haskins, and David J had all been members of Bauhaus and later Tones on Tail.
True. The rapper, beatboxer, singer and DJ is also a comedian.
The GoGos had hits with \"Our Lips Are Sealed\", \"Head Over Heals\", and \"Vacation\". \"In Your Room\" and \"Eternal Flame\" were sung by The Bangles.
George Strait sang the hit country song \"All My Exes Live in Texas\".
Eddie Levert, Keith Sweat, and Johnny Gill made up LSG.
\"Come On Eileen\" was a #1 hit for Dexys Midnight Runners.
